page.syntax: GUID as C = a5ws_Get_GUID_From_Ulink(C ulink [,* request ])

argument.name: GUID
argument.description: The unique ID assigned to a user in the web security system.

argument.name: ulink
argument.description: The ulink value of a person in the web security user table.

argument.name: request
argument.description: Optional. The Request system variable. It is added automatically by the server when run from a web page.

page.description: Returns a user GUID from a user ulink value if the ulink option is configured and a value is found. 'Request' is added automatically by the server when run from a web page.
page.discussion: The A5WS_Get_GUID_From_Ulink() returns a user GUID from a user ulink value if the ulink option is configured and a value is found. If the Ulink option is not configured, a blank value is returned. Limitations: Web applications only.

see.ref: Returns a user GUID from a user ulink value
